snippet.title: Battletoads and Double Dragon (Tradewest, 1993) - NES Gameplay
snippet.description:
The game presents the characters from the famous series Double Dragon, Billy and Jimmy - two young martial arts experts. Also included are three humanoid toads from the Battletoads game. The characters, including enemies, are mostly from the Battletoads game. In the beginning of the game, the player must choose between the five hero-characters: Billy, Jimmy (humans), Zitz, Pimple or Rash (toads). Then, the chosen character must walk through different scenarios, kicking and punching each enemy which comes onscreen. Like many such games, a boss is included at the end of each stage, which challenges the player before they can progress to a higher level of the game. 

NES Relatives:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G83LppecVGA
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uilX4h8sEBg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6GHVS5YpTOs
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sSL7fTupMUY


NESGUIDE ARCHIVE INFO

The original NES gameplay archive, est 2007 includes gameplay captures from all commercial releases from the US market with a few extras (like famicom releases) just for fun. As of Dec 2024, I've resumed efforts to update some of the older (some 360p) videos with higher-def captures. Text updates will be posted to BlueSky (which doesn't require an account to view). Please follow there (or just bookmark the url) if you're interested!

https://bsky.app/profile/nesguide.com
